item.title: What does this command do?
item.dc:creator: @eyeownyew Eyeownyew
item.description:
@eyeownyew wrote:

If you click on it while you’re a donator, nothing should show up.
If you’re not a donator and are a normal member, the contained code will show.

Read full topic

item.title: What does this command do?
item.dc:creator: @b15 b15
item.description:
@b15 wrote:

hey i would like to know what happens when i click the respect button as a doner.
i couldent see any changes so far. any help? Thanks!

if (buttonId == 26){//Respect if (p.Donator == 0 && p.rights == 0) { p.getActionSender().showChatboxInterface(p, 243); p.getActionSender().animateInterfaceId(p, 9835, 243, 2); p.getActionSender().setNPCId(p, 6537, 243, 2); p.getActionSender().setString(p, "KillerZone", 243, 3); p.getActionSender().setString(p, "Commands located in this section,", 243, 4); p.getActionSender().setString(p, "Are for Donators,pm Runescape", 243, 5); p.getActionSender().setString(p, "To buy donator for $5. ", 243, 6); } else { for (Player pl : Server.engine.players) { if (pl != null) { try { } catch (Exception e) { } } } } }

Read full topic
